description: Land Reform Commission Vs.Volter Stephen Gunarathne before Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J.

keywords: State land (Recovery of Possession) Act 1979, as amended - Forms prescribed in the schedule to the Act - Whether imperative - Whether the Chairman of Land Reform Commission is a competent authority under the Act -  Should the Competent authority be a natural person who could form an opinion -Application is undated - Whether fatal,  Effect of a pending action in the District Court.
